GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an article object whose .article_id matches the :article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up a list of all comments whose .article_id matches :article_id
